name: Storm Warning Pre-Alpha Mix - Codename: Shirley
name_original: Storm Warning Pre-Alpha Mix - Codename: Shirley
description:
What has five wheels, one leg, a knife for a nose, a shell made of a titanium-mithril alloy, and is spoken of in tall tales by the robots of Oppidia? Cutron McGee, the sole playable character of this one-level proof of concept. The concept being "I can make games."

This is my first game, it's not much (considering there's no animation), but it's a start of something much bigger.

If you're good, you can beat it in less than a minute, not counting the credits sequence.

What's with the name? "Storm Warning Pre-Alpha Mix - Codename: Shirley"? Sounds like it's one math away from being a snide Kingdom Hearts parody, doesn't it? Well, my overall project is named Storm Warning, this work is kinda like a Pre-Alpha, the Mix part is an honest homage to Kingdom Hearts' Final Mixes. As for Codename: Shirley? Because I am serious, and don't call me Shirley.

Curious about all this and where this will lead? Well, follow me on Twitter (@PantaroP) or my secondary Tumblr (@Cutron, I'd link my main account but it's mostly general bloggery). 

The download contains a version of the game for those working with 32-bit Windows and a version of the game for those working with 64-bit Windows. If you're using Mac, you're out of luck. For now anyway.

80% of the donations will be given to charity.
